title: His Obsession
description: This is the second book in the Obsessions series,Hunter Ellis is on Kiawah Island for a business deal when a tropical storm hits, stranding him. He stumbles into the Beachside Café trying to find a dry place to ride out the storm and is hooked after one taste of their food. Then he sees the curvy, redheaded chef and -- he becomes obsessed.Now, he’s determined to stay on the island until he’s shown his girl just how perfect they could be together.** Warning! ** This book alpha is over-the-top, head over heels in love with his girl. If you're looking for a steamy insta-love story then this book is for you!
author: Shaw Hart
